attributes.action: Completely lock down other than supermarkets and key workers!
attributes.additional_details:
Borris needs to litrally take this on the chin and accept defeat! The virus will get through all of us if we don't act now, construction can still work well I'm a construction worker and can't enter other people's homes so how can I work?

ACT NOW SAVE LIVES FULL UK LOCKDOWN NOW, NO SCHOOLS NO CONSTRUCTION NO NOTHING, HOSPITALS AND DR'S POLICE AND FIRE TO REMAIN OPEN ALONG SIDE ANY SHOPS AND TAKE AWAYS THAT SELL FOOD!

ECONOMY CAN BE REBUILT BUT PEOPLE'S LIFE'S CAN'T
attributes.background: ENOUGH IS ENOUGH, A ECONOMY CAN BE REBUILT BUT PEOPLE'S LIFE'S CAN'T! CLOSE EVERYTHING APART FROM HOSPITALS DR'S AND SUPERMARKETS! 4 WEEKS FULL UK LOCKDOWN. WILL LITRALLY END THE SPREAD OF COVID, CLOSE BOARDERS CLOSE PUBLIC TRANSPORT, SAVE LIVES ACT NOW

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Enforce an extreme two-week lockdown
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553156
